title: The Beginning
description: MIN was established with the goal of making mathematics education accessible to all students across Nepal.

title: First Programs
description: Launched ETA Campaigns and Junior Mathematics Olympiad Camp (JMOC)

title: Community Growth
description: Reaching diverse students nationwide through a combination of in-person and digital initiatives.

title: Digital Innovation
description: Started YouTube series and Mathematical Modelling Bootcamp (MÂ³)

title: Impact
description: MIN is recognized as one of the top 100 education innovations globally by HundrED for their pioneering work in mathematics education.

title: Future Vision
description: Expanding digital presence and international collaborations
